archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.3d: d) a set of automated tools (e.g. a Security Information Event Management System (SIEM), Intrusion Detection System (IDS)/Intrusion Prevention System (IPS), log management tools, network behaviours analysis (NBA) and vulnerability scanners)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
